definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1

sentences.english: IN 1887 physicists were feeling pretty smug about their subject.
sentences.chinese: 1887年物理学家们对自己的学科都颇为自鸣得意。

sentences.english: One of the Meccas for the leading physicists of that time was in Gottingen.
sentences.chinese: 那个时候引导物理学家的麦加圣地之一，是哥廷根。

sentences.english: To preserve the theory, physicists would have to make some changes. [Video: Dark Matter in 3-D]
sentences.chinese: 为了保持这个理论，物理学家就必须去做某些修改。

sentences.english: The successful physicist never puts on airs.
sentences.chinese: 这位卓有成就的物理学家从不搭架子。

sentences.english: The quote comes from this fairly well-known physicist.
sentences.chinese: 引自这位著名的物理学家。

sentences.english: Spirited debates have erupted between physicists concerning these wormholes.
sentences.chinese: 之间爆发了热烈的争论，就这些虫洞物理学家。

sentences.english: I'm a geophysicist, and I've trained my students to find oil.
sentences.chinese: 我是地球物理学家，我培训我的学生们寻找石油。

sentences.english: Man is at least different from them insofar as he is a physicist and an engineer.
sentences.chinese: 即使是人的话，物理学家和工程师也存在很大的区别。

sentences.english: And Pauli was asked his opinion about another physicist.
sentences.chinese: 有人问泡利对另一个物理学家的看法。

sentences.english: And physicists are very parsimonious with postulates.
sentences.chinese: 而物理学家的原则是使用尽量少的假定。

sentences.english: Yong physicists should actively participate in exploring the nature of life.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的物理学家应积极地参与揭示生命本质的活动。

sentences.english: In fact, astrophysicists assure us the universe has no center;
sentences.chinese: 事实上，天文物理学家肯定地说，宇宙没有中心。
安大略的天体物理学家，也同意这个观点。

sentences.english: Already in the 19th century, physicists moved on to a "one-dimensional" model.
sentences.chinese: 早在19世纪，物理学家就试图建立一个一维模型。

sentences.english: It was named after the Swedish physicist Anders Angstrom.
sentences.chinese: 它取名于瑞典物理学家埃格斯特朗。

sentences.english: Archimedes , a great physicist , discovered the principle of floating bodies .
sentences.chinese: 阿基米德，一位伟大的物理学家，发现了浮体原理。

pinyin: tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1

definition: Fermi (name)/Enrico Fermi (1901-1954), Italian born US nuclear physicist
Henri Poincaré (1854-1912), French mathematician, physician and philosopher
